content: /tprabhaathatthinte srashdaavum, andhakaaratthe maayichukallanyu srshdikallkku prakaasham nalki santoshippikkunnavanumaaya kartthaave! Nyangallil paripaakathayulllla nadapadikall srshdich, paapaandhakaaratthe nyangallilninnu poornnamaayi neekkikkallayename. Nyangallude kartthaavum nithya daivavume! Ninte krpayude mahaneeyakiranangallaal nyangalle prashobhippichu santoshippikkukayum cheyyaname.
Karunayulllla daivame! Ninte karunayaal nyangallodu karuna cheyyaname.

Vannen vandichen-svargamahaaraajaave! Nin
Simhaasanasavidham paapamashesham pokkaname.

Yaachikkunnen nyaan nallavane! Nin karunaykkaayu
Karunaasaagarame paapamashesham pokkaname.

Dyuthiye! Dyuthithanayaa! Dyuthiyilaho nivasippone
Irull theendaatthamahaa-dyuthiyathilenne vasippikka

Azhalaarnnoroozhi nin vellivaale thellivaarnnu
Santaanangallumaayu sthuthiyennekkum paadunnu.

Thaapam paathaki nyaan-poondappoll pakayillaathe
Nee! Kaikkondenne-krpayaal paapakshama nalka

Thirumeyu rakthatthaal-kadaparihaaram nyaan nedi
Enne praanadane!-paathaallatthil thallllaruthe.

Naathhaa! Nin sharane-mrtharaayorkkaayu nalkaname
Mannil sabhayithilum-meloorishilemilumormma

Kartthaave! Sthuthithe nin sthuthi vaanilumuzhiyilum
Ninne sthuthi cheyyoo vaanavaroppam maanavarum.

Naathhaa! Doothasthuthi naadatthaal nin sthuthi paadaan
Pulariyilenneyunartthenam
Ninne vaazhtthaanennadharangalleyangu thurannen
Cheyyuka krpanaathhaa! Devaa!

Pethgomo-kartthaave! Praarththhanakettarull haa......
Kaikkollllanamaharonanachathupole-dhoopamithum
Kondadiyaar shushrooshaye ninuvayarin yaachana pol
/tkadalathil yaunaanennapole
/tkaniyuka daasanmaarilennum

Ennum sthuthinin kanivinu kaniverum rakshakane!
Ethra niranyinnengum kaanunnu nin daanam
/tninnu vayarodundaaya-kopam
/tnilavilliyaal nee! Neekkiyallo.

Unnatha simhaasanamathilunnathanaay-vaazhumpoll
Dhanyatha nediya kanyakayude madiyil-laallithane!
/tsrshdiyilellaa-bhaagatthum
/tnila nirtthaname! Nin shaanti.

Mullmarameriyaatherithee than naduvil kandathupol
Chinmayanammariyaammil vasichu-shareeram poondu
/tathinaal bhamgavumaakkanyaa
/tvrathamudraykkundaa-yilla.

Sarvveshaa! Ninpriyanibiyanmaar than-praarththhanayaal
Nin suvisheshakaraam shleehanmaar than-yaachanayaal
/tsrshdiyilellaa-bhaagatthum
/tnilanirtthaname-nin shaanti

Lokam thaathasahodarar jaathiyathum-tharavaadum
aakeyupekshicheshuvinaayu maranam snehicha
/tsahadenmaare sadaa-kaalam
Smaranam cheythathu nannettam.

Vellivuniranyoreesho! Nin vellivaal-kaanunnu
Velliveeyadiyaarakhilaadhaaramathaam-vellivum nee!
/tkaantyaa nyangalle nee! Thaathan
/tkathire! Shobhippi-kkennum

Haabelinkunyaadum nohinude-kaazhchayathum
Abraahaam than baliyum kaikkonda-kartthaave!
/tnompum praarththhanayum-kaikko
/tndan paaladiyaare kaakkuka

Kartthaave! Nin rakthashareerangall kaikkondu
Bhaktharathaayi marichorkkarullaname-nallormma
/tninte mahathvamudikkum-naall
/tnilkkanamavar vala-bhaagatth.

Pethgomo-sampannarumagathikallum oru pol
Abraahaam balinalkiya pol
Pularvellayil naam praarththhichaal
Varuvaa-nulllloru pulariyathil-kaanaam mashihaaye
Jolikkaare! Nallavare!
Svargavumazhivillaatthuyirum
Nedaa-netthuvinennevam-nammodavanothum.

Sthuthi nammallkkaayu vidhinilaye
Nilakollllum thrithvatthinaayu
Sthuthi nammude paapam pokkum.... Thrithvatthinu nithyam
Sthuthi sarvvaadheeshaa! Ninnil
Vishvaasam kondonirullin
Pidiyil petteedaathennum-mevum nin prabhayil

Nampiya nammallkkaayu nalki
Thaathan naathhane, daaveedin
Sutharakshakane bethlahem-uyirinnappamathum
Preshakanaam thaathan vandyan
Maathaavaam mariyaam dhanya
Priyayaam sabha saubhaagyavathi-sthothram paadunnu.

Bhaagyam mariyaaminu nalku-
Nnulakil thalamurayudaneellam
Svargaadhipanude thanayanthan-maathaavaayathinaal
Udayam cheythaan mariyaamil
Kanyaamudraykkazhivenye
Bhoosvargangallilapperunnaa llaaghoshikkunnu.

Pantiruvaidyare lokatthin
naalathirukallil preshippi-
Chevam nammude kartthaavaam-eesho kalppichaan
dushdaathmaganatthe neekkin
saukhyam rogaarttharkkarullin
daanam kittiya nalvarama-ngekin daanamathaay

Svargeeyerushalem puriyil
sahader kayarichennappoll
roohaavaravelppodu kushalam chodichura cheythaan
vaanin manavarathan suthare!
Shaantyaasodarare! Varuvin
nedin svargeeyam raajyam-chiramaam jeevithavum

Mahitha charithran maartthommaa!
Bhaagyam bhaagyanidhe! Thaathaa!
Ihalokatthin malinathathotti-ttillethum ninne
pakshi kanakke kenikallozhi
nyadaviyilabhayam nee! Nedi
ninnormmayithaaghoshikku nnirulokangallilum

Duritham nirayum kuzhiyeennum
naashatthin malinathayeennum
purame thingidumirulleennum naathhaa! Rakshikka
vidhidivasatthil sahadenmaar
jayamakudam nedeedumpoll
sthuthipaadanamavarodonnichadiyaar manavarayil

Sukrthikalle prathiyallortthaal
Paapikallanuthaapikallaakaan
Nyaanaagathanaayennevam-kartthaavuracheythaan
Naathhan vaathil thurannettum
paapikalle! Sharanam thedin
paapikkayyo mrthivaruvaanudayonillishdam

Nashvaramaameeyulakatthil
namme daivaathmajaraakkaan
upadeshicha pithaakkalle naam-parichodorkkenam
Svargasanaathana raajyatthil
neethiparanmaarude nirayil
daivaathmajanaashvaasamavar-kkalivodarullatte.

En vachanangalle naathhaa! Shraddhichen dhyaanam bodhikka-haale..............
En raajaavaamudayone! Ente karachil kellkkaname

Nyaan pulariyilampodorungitthirumumpil kaanappedane-haale…
Thinmayilishdamezhaatthonaam Daivam nee!

Svarga pithaavinnaathmajare!
Kartthrhitham paalippore!
Avaneyennekkum ningall
sthothram cheythu pukazhttheeduvin

Kaahallanaadatthodu kaala-tthisraayel naathhaa! Devaa!
Ennaartthu, yariho durgam paade-nipathichu.
Bhraathaakkanmaare! Kaalatthuchatthil sthuthipaadeeduvin
Nikhilajagatthodumakhilesha-nnaardratha thonniduvaan

Aadaamin santathikallude vedanayum rogavumaattaan
Vaaneennetthiya svargeeyan-vaidyan samsthuthyan
Kushdhaartthanmaar shuddhathayum-kurudanmaar kaazhchayumarike-
Chennoll paapinipaapatthin-parihaaravumaarnnu

Kartthaave! Nin aardrathanirayum vaathil thurannee
Praarththhana kettittaathmaakkallilanpundaakenam

Naathhaa! Ninnaal pakalennonam vismayapoorvvam
nyaan prabhanedi slothram paadaanenniludikka
Enneyunartthitteepularkaalam ninnevaazhtthaan
Naall muzhuvan nin thiruvachanatthil neengenam nyaan

Dhoopam anaykkaa-naayu vannetthi-praathakaalam-
Sthothram-sarvvam-nyangallumippoll-arppikkatte-
Ninvachanatthaal nidraabhaaram-neengippoyi-
Yaathanayettum-paapatthe-nee! Neekkeedenam-

Sarvvatthinnum prabha nalkeedum prabhayaam naathhaa!
Ninkrpa vaazhtthaanen bodhatthe shobhippikka

/Tkartthaave! Ninne sthothram cheyyunnathum / unnathamaaya ninte naamatthinu sthuthipaadunnathum / prabhaatha samayatthu ninte krpayeyum / raathrikaalangallil ninte vishvaasattheyum ariyi kkunnathum ethra nallathaakunnu / kartthaave! Prabhaatha samayatthu ente shabdam nee kellkkename.

/tprabhaatha samayatthu nyaan orukkatthode ninakku kaana ppedumaaraakaname / kartthaave! Ninte janangallodu karuna cheyyaname / kartthaave! Nyangallellaavarudeyum paapangall pariharichu kshamikkename / parishuddhanaayullllaave! / Ninte valathukai nyangalludemel aashvasippichu / thirunaamam nimittham nyangallude paaparogatthil ninnu / nyangalle sukhappedutthaname.
